idea-plugin.name: rainbow-fart
idea-plugin.description:
Usage: installation is enough
Rainbow fast, a cute programmer and encourager who accompanies you to write code
Porting from vscode rainbow fast plug-in
Voice resources and creativity from the 佐伯乐 rainbow fast vscode plug-in
Resource licensing: https://github.com/SaekiRaku/vscode-rainbow-fart/blob/master/LICENSE
Source code of vscode plug-in: https://github.com/SaekiRaku/vscode-rainbow-fart
Original author: 佐伯乐
---------------------------------------------------------
使用方式:安装即可
rainbow-fart 一个陪你写代码的萌妹程序员鼓励师
移植自vscode rainbow-fart插件

语音资源与创意取自佐伯乐 rainbow-fart vscode插件

资源许可: https://github.com/SaekiRaku/vscode-rainbow-fart/blob/master/LICENSE
vscode插件源码: https://github.com/SaekiRaku/vscode-rainbow-fart
原作者: 佐伯乐
